title: Executive Order 5393-Power-Site Restoration No. 444
content: So much of the order of October 29, 1913, creating Power-Site Reserve No. 406, as affects the lands hereinafter described, is hereby revoked:
T. 6 S., R. 11 E., sec. 3, NW. ¼ of SW. ¼;                           sec. 4, lot 1, SE. ¼ of NE. ¼, E. ½ Of SE. ¼.
citation: Herbert Hoover, Executive Order 5393-Power-Site Restoration No. 444 Online by Gerhard Peters and John T. Woolley, The American Presidency Project https://www.presidency.ucsb.edu/node/373032
